CustomField.formula: IF( INCLUDES(APT_PostBillPay_Channel__c, 'OTC') && (INCLUDES(APT_PostBillPay_Channel__c, 'Phone') || INCLUDES(APT_PostBillPay_Channel__c, 'Internet') || INCLUDES(APT_PostBillPay_Channel__c, 'Scan and Pay')), 'OTC with others', IF(INCLUDES(APT_PostBillPay_Channel__c, 'OTC'), 'OTC only', 'No OTC'))
CustomField.label: Channel OTC Only?
